action.text: SA 1260 (the instructions of the motion to refer) fell when cloture invoked on the motion to concur in the House amendment to the Senate amendment to H.R. 1865.
Amendment SA 1260 proposed by Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S7088; text: CR S7088) To change the enactment date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1260 proposed by Senator McConnell.
